entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 03:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: E 75 km/h gust 108 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
